016package app.supernaut.fx.micronaut.test;
017
018import app.supernaut.fx.FxForegroundApp;
019import app.supernaut.fx.FxmlLoaderFactory;
020
021import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
022import javafx.stage.Stage;
023
024/**
025 * FxForegroundApp with constructor that expects a {@link FxmlLoaderFactory}
026 */
027@Singleton
028public class BaseFxmlForegroundApp implements FxForegroundApp {
029    /** {@link FxmlLoaderFactory} for subclass access */
030    protected final FxmlLoaderFactory fxmlLoaderFactory;
031
032    /**
033     * Constructor that gets an {@link FxmlLoaderFactory} injected
034     *
035     * @param fxmlLoaderFactory the injected factory
036     */
037    public BaseFxmlForegroundApp(FxmlLoaderFactory fxmlLoaderFactory) {
038        this.fxmlLoaderFactory = fxmlLoaderFactory;
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * No-op start method (can be overridden)
043     * 
044     * @param mainView A wrapper view containing the primary {@link Stage}
045     * @throws Exception An exception occurred
046     */
047    @Override
048    public void start(FxMainView mainView) throws Exception {
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Accessor for injected {@link FxmlLoaderFactory}
053     * @return the injected factory
054     */
055    public FxmlLoaderFactory getFxmlLoaderFactory() {
056        return fxmlLoaderFactory;
057    }
058}
